definition: current custom/current way of doing things
to hold up (as an model)/to hold in esteem/to revere/to advocate
same as 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1] Book of History
same as 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1] Book of History
variant of 尚方劍|尚方剑[shang4 fang1 jian4]/imperial sword (giving bearer arbitrary powers)/in fiction, Chinese version of 007's license to kill
lit. proper behavior is based on reciprocity (idiom)/fig. to return politeness for politeness
Shangzhi county level city in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang
to promote a martial spirit/to revere military skills/warlike

sentences.english: I love this early morning, I love this Prague only scarcely dotted with visitors. On the Charles Bridges, pigeons are the only visitors looking for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 我爱这清晨，这游人尚还稀少的布拉格。

sentences.english: The etiology of moyamoya disease is still unknown.
But these new techniques can not be instead of the traditional way completely.
sentences.chinese: 但目前这些新技术尚不能完全取代熔模精密铸造技术。

sentences.english: Two passengers were hospitalized in critical condition, while injuries to the 11 others were less serious.
sentences.chinese: 两名乘客尚在抢救中，其余11名乘客伤势较轻。

sentences.english: But Agence France-Presse said the message could not be confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 不过法新社表示，这一消息尚无法证实。

sentences.english: It was not immediately clear if Li would appeal the charge.
sentences.chinese: 目前尚不清楚李是否会上诉。

sentences.english: These charts do not include counts of deserters , those convicted or executed, etc.
sentences.chinese: 这些表格尚不包括逃兵，被宣判及被处决的人，等等。

sentences.english: Under his rule, the first feature is not yet Xing Ming.
sentences.chinese: 在他的统治之下，第一个特色便是尚刑名。

sentences.english: A weather forecaster said it was not yet possible to predict what would happen on Christmas Day.
sentences.chinese: 有气象预报员称，目前尚无法预测圣诞当天的天气。

sentences.english: Lars used to say that ninety percent of Saunière’s story is fiction.
sentences.chinese: 佬司常说尚尼亚故事的百分子九十是杜撰的。

sentences.english: Although standardization is not yet complete, it is progressing.
sentences.chinese: 虽然标准化尚不完全，但也正在不断进行。

sentences.english: It was not known if the envoys were given access to Natanz's underground centrifuge production hall.
sentences.chinese: 尚不清楚代表们是否参观了纳坦兹的地下离心机设施。

sentences.english: But Mr. Obama said the current trend is reversible.
sentences.chinese: 但是奥巴马说，目前的发展趋势尚能扭转。

sentences.english: Academician Shang Yongfeng is a famous biochemist and molecular biologist.
sentences.chinese: 尚永丰院士是我国著名生物化学与分子生物学家。

sentences.english: But Koontz is only charged during his lifetime, yet without a trial.
sentences.chinese: 但昆茨生前仅被起诉，尚没有经过审判。

sentences.english: He visited Vallombrosa when he was introduced to Galileo in Fiesole.
sentences.chinese: 他被引见给尚在菲耶索的伽利略时曾经去过那里。

definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
to be in (some state, position, or condition)
